hero.subtitle: Leading consulting firm for Development, Research, and Engineering Services in Nepal.
hero.description: Established in 2013 A.D., we are a multi-disciplinary team committed to providing high-quality professional services in research, planning, and development sectors.

about_brief.title: About Us
about_brief.content: Scholar Nepal is a dedicated consulting firm specializing in research, socio-economic surveys, engineering design, environmental assessments, and institutional development. With a team of experienced professionals including economists, engineers, sociologists, and planners, we partner with government bodies and international agencies to deliver sustainable development solutions.

items.title: Research & Studies
items.description: Comprehensive socio-economic surveys, baseline studies, and impact assessments.

items.title: Engineering & Planning
items.description: Detail engineering surveys, master plans, periodic municipal plans, and project bank preparation.

items.title: Environmental Consulting
items.description: EIA (Environmental Impact Assessment) and IEE studies for infrastructure projects.

items.title: Institutional Development
items.description: Capacity building, public/social audits, and governance strengthening.
